etymologies: early 19th century: from French boule, from the name of André Charles Boulle (1642–1732), French cabinetmaker. The variant buhl is apparently a modern Germanized spelling

definitions: brass, tortoiseshell, or other material cut to make a pattern and used for inlaying furniture
shortDefinitions: brass, tortoiseshell, or other material cut to make pattern and used for inlaying furniture
